Johannes Petrus Meintjes (19 Mee 1923 na 7 Julaị 1980) bụ onye na-ese ihe nakwa onye edemede si South Africa.
Meintjes tolitere n'ugbo ezinụlọ ya n'ugwu dị nso na Molteno

Ọ biri ma rụọ ọrụ na Cape Town ruo ọtụtụ afọ, kụzie nka, gaa maka ihe ngosi ma merie ọtụtụ onyinye na South Africa nakwa na mba ụwa.
N'afọ 1965, ọ lara ezumike nká na Molteno, ebe o lekwasịrị anya n'ide ya
Ọ gara n'ihu merie ọtụtụ onyinye edemede.
